title: Here’s what I didn’t know about “content”
description: In part 3 of my series I’m trying to find out what I didn’t know about the `content` property.
author: Manuel Matuzović

title: The CSS “content” property accepts alternative text
description: The CSS ‘content’ property allows a way to provide an alternative text
author: stefan judis

title: CSS Content | CSS-Tricks
description: CSS has a property called content. It can only be used with the pseudo elements :after and :before. It is written like a pseudo selector (with the colon),

title: content
description: The content CSS property replaces an element with a generated value. Objects inserted using the content property are anonymous replaced elements.
author: MDN
